title: Garry Moore
summary: Garry Moore  (born Thomas Garrison Morfit; January 31, 1915 â€“ November 28, 1993) was an American entertainer, comedic personality, game show host, and humorist best known for his work in television. He began a long career with the CBS network starting in radio from 1937 and then as a television host on several variety and game shows from 1949 to the mid-1970s.
